body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Joe Wilson and I work for DataCar Solutions. May I have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ruth. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling nervous about the data management at the Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concerns. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. One more piece of information we need is your email address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Ruth. We will look into the data management issue. Is there anything else you'd like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ruth. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
